## HW 20.1-1 a, b, c

```{r}
random <- c(.3039, .7914, .8543, .6902, .3004, .0383)

#unbiased coin
flips <- character()
for(i in  random){
  if(i <= .50){
    flips <- c(flips, "Heads")
  }
  else{
    flips <- c(flips, "Tails")
  }
}

#Pitcher 60% strikes, 40% balls
pitches <- character()
for(i in  random){
  if(i <= .60){
    pitches <- c(pitches, "Strike")
  }
  else{
    pitches <- c(pitches, "Ball")
  }
}

#traffic light Green 40%, Yellow 10%, Red 50%
lights <- character()
for(i in random){
  if(i <= .10){
    lights <- c(lights, 'yellow')
  }
  if(i > .10 & i <=.50){
    lights <- c(lights, 'green')
  }
  if(i > .50){
    lights <- c(lights, 'red')
  }
}

flips
pitches
lights

```
